events.message: I would like to request a refund for the jacket I bought last week. It was supposed to be delivered in good condition, but I am not satisfied with it.
The reported problem was identified as a refund request based on the customer's dissatisfaction and mention of money back.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's request and follow up shortly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I am here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, I need your order number and a little more context about why you want the refund.
The order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the jacket size is too small and not as described on the website.
Thank you for the details. We can start processing your refund or offer an exchange for a different size. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer to get a refund if possible. Please proceed with that option as soon as you can.
Your refund has been processed successfully and should appear on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm your refund was received. Please let us know if you have any further questions or need assistance.
We are closing your case now as the refund issue was resolved to your satisfaction. Thank you for contacting support.
